name: The Amazing, The Wonderful, Golf Spectacular
name_original: The Amazing, The Wonderful, Golf Spectacular
description:
Goal: The aim of the game is to go through each level shooting the golf ball into the hole (orb) in as little amount of strokes as possible, just like in a real game of golf, whilst maneuvering through obstacles that will either help or hinder the player.

Basic Controls:
Click & hold to shoot

Use keys 1-9 to automatically switch between levels
Use 'R' to be taken back to the main menu during any level

Sources:
Title Image - (https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/1211377-golf-ball-on-green-hill-background)
Fonts - (https://www.fontspace.com/) (CyberwayRiders,  DarkSeed and Revenant used)
SpriteShape - Package assets downloaded for level layout
Tilemap - (https://aekae13.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-walls-reconfig) Used for making the tilemap level layout of level 3

Features:

  • Core Functionality (Incomplete):
    Ball aiming & shooting
    Ball aiming line
    Ball Reset
  • Extra Functionality:
    Visual Style
  • User Interface:
    Title Screen with level select
  • Level1_Default:
    Functionality
